name: react-async
description: React component for declarative promise resolution and data fetching
author: Gert Hengeveld <info@ghengeveld.nl>

scripts.test:compat: npm run test:backwards && npm run test:forwards && npm run test:latest
scripts.test:backwards: npm i react@16.3.1 react-dom@16.3.1 && npm test
scripts.test:forwards: npm i react@next react-dom@next && npm test
scripts.test:latest: npm i react@latest react-dom@latest && npm test
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run test:compat && npm run build
